data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schüller, Myriam, Hilbig, Brigitte (2007): Three new species of the genus Oligobregma (Polychaeta, Scalibregmatidae) from the Scotia and Weddell Seas (Antarctica). Zootaxa 1391: 35-45, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175240
